title: Can give me back my money ??? Pixel 4 camera suck , I been using pixel 2 way better then pixel 4 ???
content: Pixel 4 camera suckkkkkk, and the screen yellowish , font camera suck.....I been using pixel 2 for two year that way better then pixel 4.....Google pls help me ....I do like take picture with Google phone but pixel 4 noooooo....
